nodes.text: Valhoun's Vultures was an infamous special tactics squad of the Galactic Republic that operated by the time of the Cold War. They blew up an ammo supply and wiped out an entire Imperial Battalion on Alderaan. They also sabotaged an Imperial shipyard near Elom.
A Sith official was tasked by Sergeant Drexel to eliminating the team after losing a squad of his commandos to the Vultures that lured them into a minefield.
